reviews.review: Absolute classic of it's genre, undoubtedly the most legendary puzzle game out there.
mejor que el 1 y mas largo letsgooooooooo
this game is cool and i want more i want you to play it or i will come to life and end u
This is absolutely one of the best singleplayer games every created. I wish I could play it for the first time again. It's so fucking good.
P O T A T O

[h1]Great game[/h1]
Really fun game, so much more gameplay than the first game. Just in case you didn't realise, definitely play Portal [b]before[/b] playing Portal 2 if you're going for story or whatever

Cara... é portal 2, lançado em 2011 e revolucionando o mercado dos video games, uma referencia de coop e puzzle game, não existe um jeito simples de definir esse jogo, incrível parece pouco, com uma experiencia coop insuperável o único jeito de definir é... PORTAL 2
Tout est génial, l'histoire, la narration, le gameplay, bref, Must Have pour votre bibliothèque Steam

It's just freaking amazing.
I can't believe i didn't play it earlier. I really hope for part 3, and more GLaDOS

orignally beat this on ps3, just recently got it on computer. this game is a masterpiece. the soundtrack is absolutely incredible and this is one of my favorite games of all time. if you have 10$ to spare and haven't played this then buy this game. 10/10 would rip a hole in spacetime again
Portal 2 is simply the original game "Portal" by Valve but it is on source engine 2 so it is more awesomer
It's a very good game! I reccommend it!

Habe seit langen nicht mehr so ein geniales, witziges , und packened spiel gezockt .... würde mich über einen 3ten teil mega freuen :D ... man merkt das die macher von spiel richtig bock hatten .. immer so weiter ... wil ja nicht spoilern, aber einmal angefangen kann man nicht mehr aufhören :) .

One of a kind, especially for its time. Considerable changes since the previous game
esta guapo el jugo y tal pero al final es una ralladura mental
the story is significantly better than the first game's
I had a lot of fun playing the co op with my friends. I also think that the writing is amazing and very funny.

it is a realy good and fun game and i think that anyone would like it

oyun cidden cok iyi bulmaca acısından olsun bolum tasarımlarından olsun kessinlikle almanızı tavsiye ederim
its got the story, its got the easy and hard levels, its got it all.

Esse jogo é meio antigo mas mesmo comprando agora ainda acho ele muito legal e divertido, joguei algumas fazes com um amigo meu e não me arrependo de ter comprado! ele tem uns puzzles bem complicados até, faz com que você e quem você está jogando pensarem bastante juntos.
Kafa yormalık güzel bir oyun 2 kisilik ve tek kisilik oynayabiliyorsunuz sistem istemeyen bir oyun ve ucuz ama bulmacalı bir oyun olduğu icin kafanız ağrıyabilir
Portal 1 is better. Portal 2 is really good, but I think it is a bit dragged in the mid game.
It's too dark in many places, and the male voice actor spoils the atmosphere. Also the computer is inappropriately obnoxious. I don't want my kids worrying about their body image, for example.
이 게임을 만든 사람은 천재가 맞다
Без интернета не скачивается... Да и по моему портал слишком дорогой 0/10

Отличная игра головоломка с хорошей графикой. И её есть за что похвалить в частности за сюжет. Больше всего мне понравилась озвучка она координально отличается от первой части. Отличные шутки от гладос отлично вписались а сетинг. Кооператив тоже не разочаровал. 9 из 10.
